title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 466.3 - Commissions on steam sales
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 466.3 - Commissions on steam sales

State Regulations

If the utility distributes all or a part of its steam
through an agent but the sales are made to customers under rate schedules filed
by the utility, then the utility shall credit its revenue accounts with the
full amount of sales to customers. The commission paid to the agent shall be
charged to account 804, Commissions Paid under Agency Sales Contracts, and any
distribution expenses charged by the agent shall be debited to the appropriate
expense accounts. Agents shall credit the amount of commissions earned to
operating revenue account 615, Miscellaneous Steam Revenues. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
466.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
